message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $180.  It's a very unique item.
I understand it's a unique item, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $110?
